body: @iamanarchist holy hell thanks dude TIL you can block artist. this is super helpful feature. now I can block this abomination piece of shit.
awesome! thanks to the translator, cant wait for more! ozaki is my favorite!
@elixia so you read shitty underaged trap and ghari and shit on other's work. Plus if you really hate the artist just blacklist him on your account. No need to use some shitty scripts.
Don’t shit on someone else’s work when you probably can’t draw and top it off who is only interested in trap I also can’t draw but respect people who can this is amazing

how could someone upload, let alone translate this abomination piece of shit? seriously, this art is so fugly I wrote a tampermonkey script to hide this artist works on this website (I'm on different computer now so I don't have the script on). this art is so fugly it gives me a fucking nightmare.
